a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cumulative share of the land area burnt by wildfires by week, World

Percentage of the land area burnt by
wildfires
. The total area consumed by wildfires is recorded for each fire
event, even if fires occur in the same location multiple times.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2025); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024)
Note: The numbers 1 to 52 on the horizontal axis represent the weeks from the start of the year, from 1 for the first week of January to 52 for
